name: Slack Statsbot
description: A Slack bot that reports on how much space men are taking up.

SLACK_TOKEN.description: The API token in the Slack bot integration settings

REPORTING_INTERVAL.description: A crontab-style specification of how often the bot should report statistics.

REPORTING_THRESHOLD.description: The minimum number of messages that must be sent in a channel before the bot will report.

STATS_CHANNEL.description: The channel where the bot reports verbose statistics.

TOP_UNKNOWNS_TO_QUERY.description: The bot will query (only once) the top N people who have yet to self-identify to ask them to do so.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: There is no web interface to the bot.

WORKER_CONCURRENCY.description: The bot operates as a worker. Sadly, while WEB_CONCURRENCY works to set the number of web processes to 0, this has no effect, so you will have to manually set the number of worker processes to 1 after the application has been created.
